Title: Relates to the creation of the "No Hate NY" license plate and the "No Hate NY fund"
Summary: Relates to the creation of the "No Hate NY" license plate and the "No Hate NY fund" to support hate crime awareness and prevention programs.
LawCode: Add ยง404-ff, V & T L; add ยง99-ss, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to authorizing the creation of a "No Hate NY" license plate; and to amend the state finance law, in relation to creating the "No Hate NY fund"
